actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to eliminate the provisions of law which presently prohibit recipients of supplemental security income benefits under title XVI of the Social Security Act from participating in the food stamp and surplus commodity programs.

summary.text: Eliminates the provisions of law which prohibit recipients of supplemental security income benefits under title XVI of the Social Security Act from participating in the food stamp and surplus commodity programs.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the provisions of law which presently prohibit recipients of supplemental security income benefits under title XVI of the Social Security Act from participating in the food stamp and surplus commodity programs.
